testcaseName: Zoster: Zoster Dose administered at 50 years of age
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered ZVL at age 50 years, that the first dose of the RZV vaccine should be forecasted at 8 weeks later.
reasonForChange:
V3.4: Test case updated to accommodate new ACIP Zoster recommendations.
V2.0: New test case for version 2.0 which expanded scope into Adult recommendations
